original_text: Then Abraham went near to the Lord and he asked, ‘Will you destroy the good people as well as the bad people?
korean_text: 아브라함이 가까이 나아가 이르되 주께서 의인을 악인과 함께 멸하려 하시나이까

sentences.original_text: Then Abraham went near to the Lord
Will you destroy the good people
as well as the bad people?
